comments.comments_text: FK Crvena zvezda take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: FK [TEAM] take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

comments.comments_text: Aleksandar Katai (Crvena zvezda) quickly gets to a rebound. He is not worried how far out he is and slams the ball towards goal. To the amazement of all, it goes all the way into the bottom right corner. He makes it 1:0 with this magnificent strike.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Guelor Kanga (Crvena zvezda) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Aibol Abiken (K. Almaty) saw red with that tackle. Andris Treimanis won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: Aleksandar Katai (Crvena zvezda) proves that he is an excellent free-kick taker after finding the back of the net with a clever shot that goes straight into the bottom right corner!
